title: "How to use / Hint" button on the screen when I had ordered Pixel4a
content:
Somebody tell me where the "How to use / Hint" Button on the screen
that displayed while my order finished,  links to.

I ordered Pixel 4a on google store.
When I had finished my order process,
"to whom uses Pixel first time"  instruction and "How to use / Hint" button
was there on the right side of screen.
But, I didn't click that button, and I changed the page unexpectedly.
And it couldn't be back to that page.

My curiosity just wants to know where that button links to.
Please tell me URL, somebody click that button.

About above, The words of caption of button may not be accurate.
Because I didn't set the language of Google store as English,
so I have translated that from my mother tongue.
